1.text: Play the game with 2 to 4 players.

2.text: Shuffle the dominoes face down and draw to see who plays first.

3.text: Have each player draw 7 dominoes for their hand.

4.text: Place the first tile in the center of the table to begin the round.

5.text: Take turns building off the tiles on the board with the tiles in your hand.

6.text: Pick up a tile from the draw pile if you can't play a tile in your hand.

7.text: Win the round by using all of the dominoes in your hand.

8.text: Tally the score by adding up the points left in each player's hand.

9.text: Pull out the double-12 or double-9 domino from the set.

10.text: Shuffle the remaining dominoes facedown on the table in front of you.

11.text: Have each player draw their cards from the shuffled tiles.

12.text: Put the remaining tiles into the “train yard” to draw from on future turns.

13.text: Set the double domino in the center of the table to begin play.

14.text: Pick someone to start and take turns clockwise around the table.

15.text: Win a hand by being the first to lay down all of your dominoes.

16.text: Continue playing and keeping score until all the double tiles are used.
